nodes.bodyText: Note this change: some events are fired synchronously from Open Project. If the code asks for something like DialogDisplayer.notify (which some code really does), the initialization request processing would block - and the notify() round-trip would be never completed, freezing LSP client-server communication completely.
Reasonable, given we after feature freeze. This functionality will certainly be needed in the future. For 12.2 we'd rather delay using it, unless necessary.
